item.title: Accordions
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Accordion sections are commonly used around the web. If you are constrained by the space accordion is a great solution, as you can see in some portfolio items we have used them to make the look of the page more appealing. Accordions are mostly used for FAQ sections. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="First Accordion Opened by Default"][vc_accordion active_tab="1"][vc_accordion_tab title="Accordion Title 1"][vc_column_text]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam quis leo at mauris faucibus suscipit. Sed orci arcu, tincidunt at commodo in, consectetur sed enim. Vestibulum aliquet justo rutrum magna tincidunt fringilla. In est nibh, fermentum eget malesuada ut, ultrices ac lacus.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Accordion Attributes:
  • title- set widgets title.
  • active tab - specifies open tab (optionally all tabs can be closed).
  • allow collapsible all- specifies if collapsing all tabs is possible.
  • extra class name - add special class to your accordion section for use in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Accordion Item Attributes:
  • title - specifies accordion title.
  • content- inside the accordion can be added any other shortcode.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Audio
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Audio shortcode may be used to embed any audio file from any website, below are just few examples. To embed the audio into Blaszok first get the embed code from any website. Open up Visual Composer and choose the Raw HTML element, paste the code inside and thats it! With the Raw HTML extension you can embed any code easily inside your page.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="SoundCloud Embed"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="GrooveShark Embed"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="MySpace Embed"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Deezer Embed"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
  • title- set widgets title.
  • content- specifies source of the audio snippet (embed code).
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Blockquote / Quote
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Quote like the name suggests are perfect for quoting text, they can be easily used through out the template. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Full Width Quote"][mpc_vc_quote quote="Your time is limited, so dont waste it living someone elses life. Dont be trapped by dogma which is living with the results of other peoples thinking. Dont let the noise of others opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary." author="- Steve Jobs"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Column Quote"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_quote quote="Stay hungry stay foolish." author=" - Steve Jobs"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_quote quote="The mind is everything. What you think you become." author="- Buddha"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_quote quote="First they ignore you, then they laugh at you, then they fight you, then you win." author="- Mahatma Gandhi"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
  • content- set the content.
  • author - set the author of the quote.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Decor Headings
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Beyond the standard headings Blaszok comes with decor headings shrotcode which allows you to simple add uppercase headings with a decor line. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h1" text="Decor Heading H1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h2" text="Decor Heading H2"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h3" text="Decor Heading H3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h4" text="Decor Heading H4"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Decor Heading H5"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h6" text="Decor Heading H6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
  • type- size of the heading.
  • text - content for the heading.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Dividers
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Dividers maybe used to easily divide partsof the content. There are two types of dividers available: standard dividers and dividers with a label. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_separator color="grey"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_text_separator title="Divider Message" title_align="separator_align_left" color="grey"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_text_separator title="Divider Message" title_align="separator_align_center" color="grey"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_text_separator title="Divider Message" title_align="separator_align_right" color="grey"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
  • title- divider text.
  • aligment - text aligment.
  • extra class name - add special class for use in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Dropcaps
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Accordion sections are commonly used around the web. If you are constrained by the space accordion is a great solution, as you can see in some portfolio items we have used them to make the look of the page more appealing. Accordions are mostly used for FAQ sections. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Huge Dropcaps"][vc_column_text][mpc_sh_dropcaps background="#b363a0" color="#ffffff" size="huge"]L[/mpc_sh_dropcaps]orem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam quis leo at mauris faucibus suscipit. Sed orci arcu, tincidunt at commodo in, consectetur sed enim. Vestibulum aliquet justo rutrum magna tincidunt fringilla. In eget nisl in justo mattis accumsan eu nec magna. Pellentesque pellentesque pharetra lacus, eget aliquet mi mattis eu. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Large Dropcaps"][vc_column_text][mpc_sh_dropcaps background="#b363a0" color="#ffffff" size="large"]P[/mpc_sh_dropcaps]hasellus iaculis posuere velit, congue placerat dui rhoncus vel. Maecenas tortor orci, aliquet et fringilla a, tristique vitae metus. Nunc dignissim varius ante, eget pellentesque felis congue ac.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Normal Dropcaps"][vc_column_text][mpc_sh_dropcaps background="#b363a0" color="#ffffff" size="normal"]E[/mpc_sh_dropcaps]tiam quis leo at mauris faucibus suscipit. Sed orci arcu, tincidunt at commodo in, consectetur sed enim. Vestibulum aliquet justo rutrum magna tincidunt.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Small Dropcaps"][vc_column_text][mpc_sh_dropcaps background="#b363a0" color="#ffffff" size="small"]N[/mpc_sh_dropcaps]ullam eleifend nisl facilisis turpis luctus a bibendum nisl vulputate. Cras feugiat leo a nulla aliquet vitae auctor odio egestas. Phasellus iaculis posuere velit.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
  • letter- content of the dropcaps.
  • size - size of the dropcaps: small, normal, large, huge.
  • background color - dropcaps background color.
  • letter color -dropcaps text color.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Share
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]There are two type of shares available in Blaszok. First one is based on font awesome icons and there are over 30 social networks available to share on. The second one is a standard social share build into Blaszok for the most popular social services like: Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest and Google+. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Standard Share"][mpc_vc_share_list title="Share:" facebook="1" twitter="1" item.title: Highlight
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Highlight shortcode may be used to feature part of the text, sometimes bold or italic just isn't enough. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposertext editor as an inline shortcode.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Inline Text Hightlight"][vc_column_text]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam quis leo at mauris faucibus suscipit. Sed orci arcu, tincidunt at commodo in. Vestibulum aliquet[mpc_sh_highlight background="#b363a0" color="#ffffff"]lorem ipsum dolar sit amen aler tos dance[/mpc_sh_highlight]justo rutrum magna tincidunt fringilla. In eget nisl in justo mattis accumsan eu nec magna. Pellentesque pellentesque eu. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis [mpc_sh_highlight background="#444444" color="#ffffff"] pharetra lacus, eget aliquet mi mattis[/mpc_sh_highlight]parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
  • text- specify text to be highlighted.
  • background color - highlight background color.
  • text color - color of the highlighted text.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Icon Lists
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Icon Lists support over 360 icons to choose from, in a single list you can have different icons and different colors of the icons. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available throughVisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/6"][mpc_vc_icon_list icon_color="#666666" text_color="#666666" item.title: Image
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Accordion sections are commonly used around the web. If you are constrained by the space accordion is a great solution, as you can see in some portfolio items we have used them to make the look of the page more appealing. Accordions are mostly used for FAQ sections. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Large Image"][vc_single_image image="2959" alignment="center" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" border_color="grey"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Image Align Left"][vc_single_image image="2959" alignment="center" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" border_color="grey"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Image Align Center"][vc_single_image image="2959" alignment="center" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" border_color="grey"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Image Align Right"][vc_single_image image="2959" alignment="center" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" border_color="grey"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • title- set image title.
  • image - specify image from media library.
  • CSS Animation- choose one of 6 preset CSS animations.
  • image size- specify image size (or responsive).
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • image aligment- specify image aligment.
  • link to large image- yes/no.
  • extra class name- add special class to your accordion section for use in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Map
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Map shortcode let's you add a google map embed, there is tone of options inside to choose from: zoom strength, size, map type and much more. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Google Map with Info Bubble"][vc_gmaps type="m" zoom="14" link="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d6344.954213379247!2d-122.02693185724871!3d37.33121192547663!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x808fb5b6e7b4b9fb%3A0x697a4332574f50d9!2sInfinite+Loop!5e0!3m2!1sen!2spl!4v1392470261075" size="400"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Small Google Map without Info Bubble"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_gmaps type="m" zoom="14" link="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d6344.954213379247!2d-122.02693185724871!3d37.33121192547663!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x808fb5b6e7b4b9fb%3A0x697a4332574f50d9!2sInfinite+Loop!5e0!3m2!1sen!2spl!4v1392470261075" size="200" bubble="1"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. item.title: Tool Tip
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Tool tip shortcode maybe used to create text based tool tip with ease. This is an inline shortcode and is available inside Text Block element of Visual Composer. Text Blog like all of Blaszok's shortcodes offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Tool Tip Inside text block"][vc_column_text]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, [mpc_sh_tooltip background="#b363a0" color="#ffffff" message="Some Tool Tip Message"]tooltip[/mpc_sh_tooltip]consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam quis leo at mauris faucibus suscipit. Sed orci arcu, tincidunt at commodo in, consectetur sed enim. Vestibulum aliquet justo rutrum magna tincidunt fringilla. In eget nisl in justo mattis accumsan eu nec magna. Pellentesque [mpc_sh_tooltip background="#b363a0" color="#ffffff" message="Some Tool Tip Message"]tooltip[/mpc_sh_tooltip]pharetra lacus, eget aliquet mi mattis eu. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Nullam ut mi in dui consectetur egestas [mpc_sh_tooltip background="#b363a0" color="#ffffff" message="Some Tool Tip Message"]tooltip[/mpc_sh_tooltip]eget vitae odio. Morbi ut ligula arcu. Nullam eleifend nisl facilisis turpis luctus a bibendum nisl vulputate. Cras feugiat leo a nulla aliquet vitae auctor odio egestas. Phasellus iaculis posuere velit, congue placerat dui rhoncus vel. Maecenas tortor orci, aliquet et fringilla a, tristique vitae metus. Nunc dignissim varius ante, eget pellentesque felis congue ac. Donec placerat adipiscing [mpc_sh_tooltip background="#b363a0" color="#ffffff" message="Some Tool Tip Message"]tooltip[/mpc_sh_tooltip]sapien id consequat. Donec nec auctor nisl. Curabitur hendrerit ultricies ligula ac blandit. Praesent non vulputate turpis. In est nibh, fermentum eget malesuada ut, ultrices ac lacus.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Accordion Attributes:
  • text - specifies text which will link to the tool tip.
  • tooltip message- specifies text displayed inside the tool tip.
  • background color- specifies the tooltip background.
  • text color - specifies tooltips text color.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Posts Slider
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Product categories slider maybe used to show customers the main categories of your productrs. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Recent Posts"][mpc_vc_blog_posts_slider type="recent" number="5" rows="1" category="all" tag="all"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Recent Posts Alternative"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="3/4"][mpc_vc_blog_posts_slider type="recent" number="4" rows="1" category="all" tag="all"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]Read Whats New Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam quis leo at mauris faucibus suscipit. Sed orci arcu, tincidunt at commodo in.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Recent Posts 2 Lines"][mpc_vc_blog_posts_slider type="recent" number="6" rows="2" category="all" tag="all"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
  • type - recent posts or random.
  • number - number of posts to display.

  • category- filter displayed posts by category.
  • tag- filter displayed posts by tags.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Products Slider
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Products slider maybe used to show customers recent, best, random or highest rated products. With the 4 settings available inside this shortcode the possibilities are really amazing. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Check out newcomers"][mpc_vc_products_slider type="recent" number="6" category="all" tag="all"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Products Slider Alternative - Best Sellers"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]View The Best Sellers Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. item.title: Lightbox
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Image lightbox are very popular, a part from adding a lightbox to shop, post and portfolio items there is also an option to add both inline (text) and image lightbox. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Lightbox in Text Block"][vc_column_text]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing [mpc_sh_lightbox src="http://demo_default.dev/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/shutterstock_144233608.jpg" caption="This is a lightbox caption"]Click For Lightbox[/mpc_sh_lightbox]elit. item.title: Video
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]You can easily add any video from the most popular video hosting sites like vimeo or youtube, all you need is the video url. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="YouTube Video"][vc_video link="http://youtu.be/eWJtY0x3h08"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Vimeo Video"][vc_video link="http://vimeo.com/20563051"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
  • widget title -add title to the video.
  • video source - url to the video.
  • extra class- add special class to be used in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Skills
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]This shortcode maybe used to present progress or skills percentage. Very simple to use, many visual option available. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Skills Flat"][vc_progress_bar values="90|Development" bgcolor="bar_blue" options="animated" units="%"][vc_progress_bar values="80|Design" bgcolor="bar_turquoise" options="animated" units="%"][vc_progress_bar values="70|Marketing" bgcolor="bar_green" options="animated" units="%"][vc_progress_bar values="95|Typography" bgcolor="custom" options="animated" units="%" custombgcolor="#b363a0"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Skill With Stripes"][vc_progress_bar values="95|Typography" bgcolor="custom" options="striped,animated" units="%" custombgcolor="#8e314a"][vc_progress_bar values="70|Marketing" bgcolor="bar_red" options="striped,animated" units="%"][vc_progress_bar values="80|Design" bgcolor="bar_black" options="striped,animated" units="%"][vc_progress_bar values="90|Development" bgcolor="bar_orange" options="striped,animated" units="%"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • title- set widgets title.
  • graphic value- value of the progress/skill bar and label
  • units- specifies units.
  • bar color- choose bar color, you can use predefined color or custom.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • add stripes- yes/no.
  • aniamte bars- yes/no.
  • extra class- you can add extra class to be used inside CSS
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Image Carousel
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Image carousels can be used as image sliders or banner rotators. This shortcode has many options (see the list of attributes at the bottom) and is very easy to use. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Standard Image Carousel"][vc_images_carousel images="2962,2961,2960,2959" onclick="link_no" custom_links_target="_self" mode="horizontal" speed="5000" slides_per_view="1" wrap="yes" img_size="860x567"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Slide Show Image Carousel Without Any Controls"][vc_images_carousel images="2962,2961,2960,2959" onclick="link_no" custom_links_target="_self" mode="horizontal" speed="3000" slides_per_view="1" wrap="yes" img_size="860x567" autoplay="yes" hide_pagination_control="yes" hide_prev_next_buttons="yes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • title- set widgets title.
  • images- specifies images.
  • image size- specifies image size.
  • on click - add lightbox, open url or do nothing.
  • slider mode - horizontal or vertical.
  • slider speed -speed of slide show in miliseconds.
  • images per view- how many images to display per view.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • slider auto play- yes/no.
  • hide pagination controls - yes/no.
  • hide buttons- yes/no.
  • partial view - if yes part of the next slide will be visible on the right side.
  • slider loop- yes/no.
  • extra class- to be used in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Content Slider
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Content slider maybe use to showcase recent/featured content. You can choose any post type you like, also narrow it by category ids etc. You can also choose between 3 effects: flex slider fade, flex slider slide and nivo slider. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Posts Slider With Slide Show"][vc_posts_slider type="flexslider_slide" interval="3" link="link_post" order="DESC" count="5" posttypes="post" thumb_size="full" slides_content="teaser" slides_title="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Portfolio Slider With Nivo Slider"][vc_posts_slider type="nivo" interval="0" link="link_post" order="DESC" count="6" posttypes="mpc_portfolio" thumb_size="full" slides_title="1" categories="photography"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Product Slider With Fade Effect"][vc_posts_slider type="flexslider_fade" interval="0" link="link_post" order="DESC" count="5" posttypes="product" thumb_size="full" slides_content="teaser" slides_title="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • title- set widgets title.
  • slide type - specifies slider type: flex with slide effect, flex with fade effect or nivo slider.
  • slides count- number of slides.
  • auto rotate slides - how often to rotate slides.
  • post type - post, product, portfolio or page.
  • description- yes/no.
  • title - yes/no.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • link -few settings where to link.
  • thumbnail size- set thumbnail size.
  • post/page ids- filter by ids.
  • categories- filter by category.
  • order by- specify posts order.
  • extra class name- specify extra class name to be used in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Widgets
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]With Blaszok you can add any standard wordpress widget inside your page. There are more then 12 widgets available by default with more to come. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_wp_posts show_date="1" number="4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h6" text="Calendar Widget"][vc_wp_calendar][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h6" text="Available Widgets"][vc_column_text]
  • WP Search
  • WP Meta
  • WP Recent Comments
  • WP Calendar
  • WP Pages
  • WP Tag Cloud
  • WP Custom Menu
  • WP Text
  • WP Recent Posts
  • WP Links
  • WP Categories
  • WP Archvive
  • WP RSS
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Attributes depends from the widgets.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Message Boxes / Alerts
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Notices maybe used to show important information to users about updates or changes on the website. There are 4 pre-styled box types. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Standard Notice Boxes"][vc_message color="alert-info"]This is a standard Informational message box, nothing to see hear. Carry on.[/vc_message][vc_message color="alert-block"]This is a standard Warning message box, nothing to see hear. Carry on.[/vc_message][vc_message color="alert-success"]This is a standard Success message box, nothing to see hear. Carry on.[/vc_message][vc_message color="alert-error"]This is a standard Error message box, nothing to see hear. Carry on.[/vc_message][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • message type- choose from 4 pre-styled types.
  • content - content of the notice box.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Charts
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Charts maybe used to represent the progress or maybe a skill learning curve. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Pie Charts"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_pie value="100" label_value="100" color="btn-primary" units="%" title="Creativity"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_pie value="80" label_value="80" color="btn-success" units="%" title="Flow"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_pie value="90" label_value="90" color="btn-info" units="%" title="Design"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_pie value="75" label_value="75" color="btn-warning" units="%" title="Marketing"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • title- set widgets title.
  • value - you can choose from 0-100.
  • label- specifies label for the chart.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • units- specify units for the value.
  • color -choose chart color.
  • extra class name- specify unique class to be used inside CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Buttons
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Buttons are one of the most used sortcodes on the web thats why we have prepared for you many customization to style and change the look of your buttons. You can set any color and on of the 369 icons additionally you can place the icon in one of 4 positions. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with item.title: Call Out Box
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Call out box are mostly use to draw people attention, for example this element can be used for a newsletter signup, promotion announcement or any other call to action. You can set any color to the button, choose one of 369 icons and one of 3 positions for the button. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Box - Button Right"][vc_cta_button call_text="free shipping for orders over $49" title="Delivered to your doors in 2 days" target="_self" position="cta_align_right" custom_color="#B163A3" custom_icon="_none" custom_pos="top" href="#"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Box - Button Left"][vc_cta_button call_text="100% Satisfaction Guarantee" title="Button Text" target="_self" position="cta_align_left" custom_color="#009c75" custom_icon="fa-cloud" custom_pos="left" href="#"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Box - Button Bottom"][vc_cta_button call_text="100% Satisfaction Guarantee" title="60 Day Refound Policy Click To Learn More" target="_self" position="cta_align_bottom" custom_color="#0093c7" custom_icon="fa-check" custom_pos="left" href="#"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • text- call out message.
  • button text - button text.
  • url- specifie link (url).
  • button position - choose button position.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • button color -set button color.
  • icon type -choose one of 369 icons.
  • icon position- choose icon position: top, left, right or bottom.
  • extra class name- add special class to your accordion section for use in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.

item.title: Brands / Partners
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]For the brands / partners section we are using our awesome image carousel shortcode. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Our Partners"][mpc_vc_images_slider images="2962,2961,2960,2959" links="#,#,#,#,#" brands="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Partners Alternative"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]Check Out Our Brands Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam quis leo at mauris faucibus suscipit. Sed orci arcu, tincidunt at commodo in.Pellentesque pellentesque pharetra lacus.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4"][mpc_vc_images_slider images="2962,2961,2960,2959" links="#,#,#,#,#" brands="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • title- set widgets title.
  • images- specifies images.
  • image size- specifies image size.
  • on click- add lightbox, open url or do nothing.
  • slider mode- horizontal or vertical.
  • slider speed -speed of slide show in miliseconds.
  • images per view- how many images to display per view.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • slider auto play- yes/no.
  • hide pagination controls - yes/no.
  • hide buttons- yes/no.
  • partial view - if yes part of the next slide will be visible on the right side.
  • slider loop- yes/no.
  • extra class- to be used in CSS.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Parallax
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Parallax maybe used to showcase any content, inside parallax you can add any section. To improve parallax content visibility you can add a color overlay or pattern overlay to it. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row font_color="#ffffff" full_width="1" parallax="1" bg_image_repeat="cover" overlay_color="#000000" overlay_color_opacity="50" overlay_pattern="1253" overlay_pattern_opacity="50" css=".vc_custom_1404987900398{margin-bottom: 2em !important;padding: 5em 0 4em !important;background: #303030 url(http://demo_default.dev/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/placeholder.jpg?id=2959) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" bg_image_fb="2959" bg_image_repeat_fb="cover"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

WHAT OUR CLIENTS SAY ABOUT US

[/vc_column_text][mpc_vc_testimonials_slider][{"author":"Samantha Johnes, Happy Customer","text":"LOREM IPSUM DOLOR SIT AMET, CONSECTETUR ADIPISCING ELIT. ETIAM QUIS LEO AT MAURIS FAUCIBUS SUSCIPIT. SED ORCI ARCU, TINCIDUNT AT COMMODO IN, CONSECTETUR SED ENIM. VESTIBULUM ALIQUET JUSTO RUTRUM MAGNA TINCIDUNT FRINGILLA."},{"author":"Mahatma Gandhi, CEO at DIVERSE","text":"MORBI UT LIGULA ARCU. NULLAM ELEIFEND NISL FACILISIS TURPIS LUCTUS A BIBENDUM NISL VULPUTATE. CRAS FEUGIAT LEO A NULLA ALIQUET VITAE AUCTOR ODIO EGESTAS. PHASELLUS IACULIS POSUERE VELIT, CONGUE PLACERAT DUI RHONCUS VEL."},{"author":"Steve Jobs, Apple CEO","text":"CUM SOCIIS NATOQUE PENATIBUS ET MAGNIS DIS PARTURIENT MONTES, NASCETUR RIDICULUS MUS. NULLAM UT MI IN DUI CONSECTETUR EGESTAS EGET VITAE ODIO, LOREM IPSUM DOLAR SIT AMEN."},{"author":"John Doe, ThemeForest.net","text":"PELLENTESQUE PELLENTESQUE PHARETRA LACUS, EGET ALIQUET MI MATTIS EU. item.title: Revolution Slider
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]With Blaszok you get this stunning slider for free (worth $19). Revolution slider is one of the most advanced sliders out there. It comes with it's own easy to use admin panel, with this slider you can easily create any slide you want. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to build complex pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Revolution Slider"][rev_slider_vc alias="default-demo_slider"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Revolution slider comes with it's own easy to use administration panel with tones of options. With this slider you can easily create stunning slides![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Layer Slider
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]LayerSlider is one of the best sliders on the market right now, thats why we have bundled it with Blaszok. Like all of Blaszok's shortcodes this one is also available through VisualComposer, which offers a simple drag & drop interface to add the slider to your pages with ease.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Slider Example 1"][layerslider_vc id="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row margin_bottom="3em" overlay_color_opacity="50" overlay_pattern_opacity="50"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Slider Example 2"][layerslider_vc id="8"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Layer slider comes with it's own vast administration panel where you can set tones of settings, styles effects etc. The possibilities are limitless.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Pricing Tables
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]CSS3 Pricing table is one of the most advanced pricing tables plugins, lets you create any table you like. It comes with over 30 sample pricing tables to get you started. It is shortcode based so you can add it anywhere.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row margin_bottom="2em" overlay_color_opacity="50" overlay_pattern_opacity="50"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Example 1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text][css3_grid id='medicenter_blue'][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row margin_bottom="2em" overlay_color_opacity="50" overlay_pattern_opacity="50"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Example 2 Sliding Table"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text][css3_grid id='medicenter_green_sliding'][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="mpc-small-bm"][vc_column width="1/1"][mpc_vc_deco_header type="h5" text="Shortcode Attributes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]CSS3 Pricing Table comes with separate administration panel, it has vast options and to be honest it gives you the ability to achieve any style and any table you like. You can add ribbons, tooltips, animation etc.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
